Web design & development

I've been designing and building websites for over 15 years, and specialize in crafting intuitive user interfaces. I've worked with companies of all sizes from sole proprietorships to Fortune 100 companies, and have the experience to bring ideas from design to launch.

Making sense of it all

My years of experience and background in both business and IT puts me in a unique position to understand all the complexities of a business and design solutions to accomplish it's goals.

Cutting edge

I love working with the latest technology and researching the latest trends on the web. The sites I build make the most of this specialized knowledge, while ensuring everything is built to work for years to come.

If you are in need of any help building or updating your website, please reach out to me! I'd love to talk about how I can craft a web presence that will help you stand out from the crowd.

Technology solutions

The web is just one small piece of the puzzle to a successful business. In the fast-paced world we live in, technology is playing an ever increasing role in all aspects of business. I'm here to bridge the gap between your real-world business challenges and transform them into technology solutions.

Client report card: A+

Happy clients = successful businesses!

With clientele expecting more and more, the only way to meet and exceed these expectations is to use technology to your advantage. From customer portals to mobile ordering apps, let's figure out the best technology to keep your clients and customers happy.

Your business 2.0

Technology is no longer a nice to have, it's a must have for your business to stay competitive in this rapidly changing, digital world. I have the experience to get you up to speed on the latest trends and turn technology from a barrier into a competitive advantage for you business.

I'd love to talk with you about how we can meet the current technology needs of your business and plan for future success.

What I do

My specialty is understanding your unique needs, crafting a technology strategy, and delivering solutions via:

Web

Website design

All aspects including: online strategy, design systems, style guides, content strategy, site maps, wireframes, prototypes, and usability testing.

Website development

From single page marketing sites to online commerce and full CMS systems; including the front-end, back-end, analytics, testing, performance, and scalability.

Graphic & logo design

Designs with your core values at heart.
Everything from logos, web graphics and design, to design for the physical world (print) with business cards, flyers, and marketing materials.

Technology

Business technology solutions

End to end technology exploration and solutions, including: internal IT, CRM technology, and exploration of digital products and services.

App development

From native apps (iOS, Android) to web apps and beyond (WatchOS, Android Wear).

Emerging technologies

I love exploring the latest tech and want to help you leap into the next generation! Some of the latest emerging tech includes: voice (Google Assistant, Apple Siri), NFC, AR and VR, connected home (Google Home, Amazon Alexa), and AI and machine learning.
